version_description: It's the official LEGO® Super Mario™ app! Explore your sets, get 3D building instructions + tutorial videos, improve your skills, build new levels and share them!
We’ve squashed a few bugs, made a few tweaks, and we’re ready to play
New! Mix your level play up with the all new Play Challenges! Try out and have fun with Beware of Boo!
New! Mix your level play up with the all new Play Challenges! Try out and have fun with Beware of Boo!

Top news in this update:
- You can now find building instructions and support for all the new LEGO® Super Mario™ sets released in January 2021.
- We've made some performance improvements in the building instructions section of the app to help your battery last longer (so you can take more time to build!)
